item.title: A map in R
item.description: We need only two commands to get a leaflet-map: library(leaflet) map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% To center the map at a certain point: setView(-58.287691, -33.137864,, zoom=13) %>% To add information at a that point: addMarkers(-58.287691, -33.137864, popup="Frigorífico Anglo") And a picture and more details: contenido <- paste(sep = "<br/>", paste0("<img src='https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/b1/El_Frigor%C3%ADfico_ANGLO_en_acci%C3%B3n.jpg", "' />"), paste0("<b>Name: </b>", "Frigorífico Anglo"), paste0("<b>Place: </b>", "Fray Bentos, Uruguay"), paste0("<a href='https://en.
